venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
Here is a link to a rally in PA for the week end of May 21, 22, and 23.
http://midatlanticsco...
This is a great opportunity to meet riders from other clubs and to promote our own Twisted Touring Scooter Club.
The plan so far is to leave Boston on Thursday approx. 5:00 pm and head to CT to meet Bruce and then we will leave from CT to go to New Holland, PA

If you want to attend got to the web site listed above, it has all the information you will need.
You need to register and reserve a room in one of the Hotels.

From Boston to New Holland is just under 400 miles.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking area behind the station.
item.name: Mid Atlantic Ralley PA
